description:
Thanks to a forbidden book, Mammon swaps bodies with a dog. But when he takes his eye off himself, dog-Mammon begins playing with HIS brothers in HIS body.  While Mammon prepares himself to be mocked, he never could have anticipated what actually happens next. Will the brothers figure out that something`s up? And will Mammon ever return to his body again?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Dog by Any Other Name
